sinner&saints.title: Sinner & Saints
sinner&saints.text: This site was developed to showcase a restaurants available cuisene and events at their fine establishment. Hence, allowing potential customers the ability to browse by meal, while also seeing more detailed information    about a selected dish. Therefore, not to be limited to but including a full description of the pricing, calories, rating, drink pairings, and allergies. Additionally, a potential customer may rate dishs and or preview the restaurants reviews and possibly leaving one of their own.
